ud3.2:8.2: maṃ → mama (sya-all), nikkhamantassa → nikkhamantaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ)
ud3.2:9.2: samiñjitaṃ → sammiñjitaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed), samiñjeyya → sammiñjeyya (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ud3.2:11.3: saṅkhyampi → saṅkhampi (bj), nopeti kalabhāgampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti →  na upeti, kalampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (sī1), na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti, upanidhimpi na upeti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ud3.2:12.3: bhagavati brahmacariye”ti → bhagavā brahmacariyeti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhagavā brahmacariyanti (mr)
ud3.2:18.5: kho tvaṃ, nanda → kho te nanda (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kho nanda (mr)
